property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: The next time an instant or sorcery spell would deal damage to you this turn, that spell deals that damage to its controller instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 2 life for each card in your graveyard. Flashback {9}{W}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Ancestor protects us in ways we can't begin to comprehend." - Mystic elder

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The animal spirits are the Ancestor's grandchildren. Remember them." - Mystic elder

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beauty stirs the memory like a sweet perfume excites the air.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {2}{W}, {T}: Aven Archer deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Aimed by the eyes of eagles, their arrows never miss the mark.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Aven Cloudchaser enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At the Reapportionment, Eagle begged to be human. The Ancestor granted half that prayer." - Nomad myth

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {W}: Aven Flock gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just as each added feather steadies the wing, so does the flock grow stronger with each new member.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player gains X life, where X is the number of cards in all graveyards with the same name as that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player chooses a number of permanents they control equal to the number of permanents controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Each player discards cards the same way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nomad and Nantuko, eagle and elephant; all the birds and beasts are charmed by his quiet dignity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His quiet words fade into the night's chill, yet they burn into his listeners' minds with all the power of a thousand suns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Cantivore's power and toughness are each equal to the number of enchantment cards in all graveyards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player can't cast creature spells this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the crimson fades from the magical embers, a final wisp of smoke will rise. Soon after, hostilities will begin anew.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player discards a card, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There will be gains for our losses. There will be rights for our wrongs."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, Sacrifice Dedicated Martyr: You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If he's so willing to suffer for his cause, then by all means, let us oblige him." - Cabal Patriarch

property.name: Rules
property.value: If damage would be dealt to you, put that many delay counters on Delaying Shield instead. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove all delay counters from Delaying Shield. For each delay counter removed this way, you lose 1 life unless you pay {1}{W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, {T}: Target permanent you control gains protection from instant spells and from sorcery spells until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her eyes blaze with the strength of twenty shields. Every glance is a salvation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: White creatures get +1/+1. Threshold - White creatures get an additional +1/+1 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their whispered prayers rally the nomads better than any war cry could.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The relationship between hunter and hunted knows nothing of alliances.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature has protection from its colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The world has enough strife as it is. Where would we be if we turned against each other?" - Pianna, nomad captain

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of targets, divided as you choose. Flashback {1}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target blocking creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The courageous accomplish more in a single moment than the cowardly do in a lifetime.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Plainswalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Plains.) Whenever Graceful Antelope deals combat damage to a player, you may have target land become a Plains until Graceful Antelope leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. Threshold - {T}: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. Activate only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls destroys a noncreature permanent you control, you may destroy target permanent that opponent controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack. Threshold - Enchanted creature can't block as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. Threshold - If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead destroy all creatures, then create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{W}, Sacrifice Lieutenant Kirtar: Exile target attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "His strengths are pride, devotion, and ambition. His weaknesses are the same." - Pianna, nomad captain

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player gains 4 life, then gains 4 life for each card named Life Burst in each graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As uplifting as a mystic's dreams.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}: Luminous Guardian gets +0/+1 until end of turn. {2}: Luminous Guardian can block an additional creature this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap an untapped Cleric you control: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It takes a remarkable cleric to turn a group of healers into a hospital.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from black and from red Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Mystic Crusader gets +1/+1 and has flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Mystic Penitent gets +1/+1 and has flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Threshold - Mystic Visionary has flying as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The aven are heralds of divinity. The greatest glory is to join them in the sky."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Mystic Zealot gets +1/+1 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nomad youths aspire to one of two roles in the tribe: priest or warrior. Their secret dream is to become both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature. Threshold - {W}{W}, {T}: Tap two target creatures. Activate only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you can take something from a nomad, it's probably bait.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a card: Patrol Hound gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the camp, it was a fierce and loyal protector. To the sentry's youngest daughter, it would always be her "Wuv Muffin."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Pianna, Nomad Captain attacks, attacking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some find inspiration in their swords. Others find it in their leaders.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from red {W}, Sacrifice Pilgrim of Justice: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I would die a thousand deaths before I let you harm another."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from black {W}, Sacrifice Pilgrim of Virtue: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A life is measured by the lives it saves."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Flashback {4}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Discard a card: Resilient Wanderer gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nomads understand many cultures and therefore travel without fear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard any number of cards. Creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn for each card discarded this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target attacking creature. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It suddenly dawned on Jorin that farming was quite a noble profession.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Good strategists seize opportunities. Great strategists make their own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a creature with flying dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Soulcatcher.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Holy couriers guide aven spirits up to the home of the Ancestor." - Mystic elder

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a green source would deal damage to you, prevent 2 of that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a black source would deal damage to you, prevent 2 of that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a red source would deal damage to you, prevent 2 of that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a blue source would deal damage to you, prevent 2 of that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a white source would deal damage to you, prevent 2 of that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, whenever target creature deals damage, you gain that much life. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is purity in all things. Even hatred." - Lieutenant Kirtar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has protection from enchantments. This effect doesn't remove Tattoo Ward. Sacrifice Tattoo Ward: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}: Testament of Faith becomes an X/X Wall creature with defender in addition to its other types until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Belief in the Ancestor is admirable, but our enemies often demand something more . . . tangible." - Pianna, nomad captain

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a card: Tireless Tribe gets +0/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've survived starvation, dwarf attacks, and heatstroke. Why should a little sandstorm bother us?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Wayward Angel gets +3/+3, is black, has trample, and has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap an untapped Cephalid you control: Tap target permanent. {U}{U}{U}: Tap all creatures without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No one can fight the tide forever."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Threshold - Enchanted creature has shroud as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to X target creatures to their owners' hands, where X is one plus the number of cards named Aether Burst in all graveyards as you cast this spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As fleeting as a cephalid's promise.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {2}{U}, Discard a card: Return Amugaba to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The aven claim it feeds on thunder and rainbows.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target Aura that's attached to a permanent. Attach it to another permanent it can enchant.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's not really stealing. It's more like extended borrowing."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Aven Fisher dies, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The same spears that catch their food today will defend their homes tomorrow.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a world still pained from burns, some are born already scarred.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {1}{U}: Target player reveals the top card of their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The tiniest ripple tells a story ten fathoms deep."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Balshan Beguiler deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals the top two cards of their library. You choose one of those cards and put it into their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{U}, Discard a card: Return Balshan Griffin to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It helps to have an extra direction in which to run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals the top four cards of their library. You choose two of those cards and put them into that player's graveyard. Put the rest on top of their library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 200 or more cards in your library, you win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wizard who reads a thousand books is powerful. The wizard who memorizes a thousand books is insane.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Books are like crops - they must be thinned for best yield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target player draws two cards, then discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cephalids value the free exchange of ideas - except for the "free" part.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Amazing, isn't it, what humans will throw away when they're drowning?"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cephalids whisper flattery in your ear, put jewels in your hand, spin dreams in your head, and stick knives in your back.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {2}{U}, Sacrifice a land: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The more they survey the dreadful dry expanses, the more the cephalids thirst to tame them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell, counter that spell unless that player pays {X}, where X is the number of cards in all graveyards with the same name as the spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}, Discard a card: Gain control of target creature until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Politics is just a subtle form of mind control - and cephalids are master politicians.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Cognivore's power and toughness are each equal to the number of instant cards in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The treasure in my mind is greater than any worldly glory."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose any number of creatures target player controls. Choose the same number of creatures another target player controls. Those players exchange control of those creatures. +lt;I+gt;(This effect lasts indefinitely.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From the sea came all life, and to the sea it will return. The sooner the better." - Emperor Aboshan

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Flashback {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Change the target of target spell with a single target unless that spell's controller pays {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What's the fun of being a wizard if you can't mess with people's heads?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dreamwinder can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. {U}, Sacrifice an Island: Target land becomes an Island until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Escape Artist can't be blocked. {U}, Discard a card: Return Escape Artist to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not even my shadow knows where I am."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search target player's library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To say Nixar had a splitting headache would be a bit of an understatement.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Flashback {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your tenacity is admirable. And futile." - Emperor Aboshan

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. Enchanted creature has "{1}, Discard a card: Untap this creature."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws cards equal to the number of cards in their hand, then discards that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One never knows when inspiration will bubble up.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap an untapped Wizard you control: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best way to teach is by example."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from your library, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at target player's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes you have to read between the minds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) You control enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Protocol demands that you bow down before me. I always stand on protocol."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Phantom Whelp attacks or blocks, return it to its owner's hand at end of combat. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It lurks in the mist, waiting for stragglers to fall behind. When the fog clears, nothing remains but footprints.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a card name, then target player mills a card. If a card with the chosen name was milled this way, you draw two cards. Otherwise, you draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For sale: Complete wizard's library. Rare scrolls, grimoires, and works of ancient spellcrafting Slightly abridged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Discard a card: Pulsating Illusion gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}, {T}: You may tap or untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Getting people to do what you want is merely a matter of telling them what they want to hear."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have a hunch we'll be seeing that one again soon." - Ambassador Laquatus

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard any number of cards. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3} for each card discarded this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Scrivener enters the battlefield, you may return target instant card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A good memory is no match for a good scribe.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{U}, Exile Shifty Doppelganger: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, that creature gains haste until end of turn. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice that creature. If you do, return Shifty Doppelganger to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a player casts a spell, sacrifice Standstill. If you do, each of that player's opponents draws three cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Memories can't simply be washed away. The mind must be scrubbed clean." - Ambassador Laquatus

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cephalids seek knowledge not to better themselves, but to best others.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Your maximum hand size is reduced by four.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Your maximum hand size is reduced by three.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first memory it sucks out of its host is how to get rid of it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Your maximum hand size is reduced by two.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Balshan wizards have long used them to gnaw away the memories they wish to forget.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player takes two extra turns after this one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's lots of time like the present.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature can't be blocked this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cephalids specialize in things unseen, be they politics, betrayal, or themselves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player mills half their library, rounded down.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dreads had half a mind to leave.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Crian's patrols afford him plenty of opportunity to take potshots at the "dirtwalkers" far below.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player may pay {2}. If the player does, they draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scribbles of a lunatic and formulas of a genius are often indistinguishable.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all permanents to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The calm comes after the storm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You draw two cards, then each other player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Knowledge can't be kept in a bottle or sealed in a box. It yearns to be spread and shared.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When one of the Patriarch's champions displeased him, he would only shake his finger. That was enough.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, mill a card. Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Bloodcurdler gets +1/+1 and has "At the beginning of your end step, exile two cards from your graveyard."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices an artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Home is where you can find a decent graveyard and strangers can disappear without awkward questions."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to three creature cards, put them into your graveyard, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scrape of shovels and the tumble of cold dirt soon muffled their pleas.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Threshold - {1}{B}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Target player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery and only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. {2}{B}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player discards X cards, where X is the number of cards in all graveyards with the same name as that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target player loses 3 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Twisted magic, twisted fate, Force the land to ooze with hate." - Cabal chant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Childhood Horror gets +2/+2 and can't block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target card from a graveyard. Flashback {B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Crypt Creeper: Exile target card from a graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To unearth its dinner, it inters itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Cursed Monstrosity becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it unless you discard a land card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Run away It's an . . . um . . . run away" - Nomad sentry

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile a card from your graveyard. Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Decaying Soil has "Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, return that card to your hand."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sheesh How am I supposed to make a decent living around here?" - Cabal grave robber

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best ideas often come from the worst minds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}, Discard a card: Regenerate Dirty Wererat. Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Dirty Wererat gets +2/+2 and can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It despises humans and squirrels and beasts and dwarves and cephalids . . .well, it despises just about everything.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A grave is the safest place to store ill-gotten treasures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target white creature. It can't be regenerated. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any fool who would die for honor is better off dead." - Cabal Patriarch

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{B}, Discard a card: Face of Fear gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's only frightened five people to death. Not my best work." - Braids, dementia summoner

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}, Sacrifice Famished Ghoul: Exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Memories have distinct tastes. Its favorites are the sickly sweetness of lost love and the bitter smokiness of cruel murder.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Filthy Cur is dealt damage, you lose that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some things even fleas won't bite.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}, Discard a card: Fledgling Imp gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Imps aren't born knowing how to fly - just how to annoy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Frightcrawler gets +2/+2 and can't block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonblack creature if its toughness is less than or equal to the number of cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Anyone can snap her fingers and yank a soul. I prefer to kill creatively." - Braids, dementia summoner

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Oddly, no one questioned the Cabal's wisdom in hiring a zombie to work at the cemetery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent may exile a card from their graveyard. If that player doesn't, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard other than basic land cards. For each card exiled this way, search that player's library for all cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals their hand. That player discards all nonland cards with the same name as another card in their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Practice makes perfect, but obsession makes better."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{B}: Infected Vermin deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. Threshold - {3}{B}: Infected Vermin deals 3 damage to each creature and each player. Activate only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zombies mourn for the living and celebrate those who will soon be given the gift of death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard any number of cards. Target player reveals their hand, then you choose a nonland card from it for each card discarded this way. That player discards those cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most popular pit fighters are brought back for encore performances.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player discards X cards, where X is one plus the number of cards named Mind Burst in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As haunting as a zombie's curse.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mindslicer dies, each player discards their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is the thing that goes bump in the night.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morbid Hunger deals 3 damage to any target. You gain 3 life. Flashback {7}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Flashback {4}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mortivore's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards. {B}: Regenerate Mortivore.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If damage would be dealt to you, exile that many cards from your graveyard instead. If you can't, you lose the game. If you would gain life, draw that many cards instead. When Nefarious Lich leaves the battlefield, you lose the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a card, Sacrifice Overeager Apprentice: Add {B}{B}{B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Slow and steady may not always win the race, but at least it doesn't end up splattered on the walls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Exile any number of cards from your graveyard: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards exiled this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/-2. Threshold - Enchanted creature gets an additional +2/-2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a creature dealt damage by Repentant Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Repentant Vampire. Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Repentant Vampire is white and has "{T}: Destroy target black creature."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Rotting Giant attacks or blocks, sacrifice it unless you exile a card from your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wracked with rot, it wrecks and ruins.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Target player discards two cards. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Victory in the pits is almost as rewarding as the methods I use to achieve it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Screams of the Damned deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's important to face your inner demons . . . unless they're the kind of demons that can kill you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile X cards from your graveyard. You draw X cards and you lose X life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player discards a card. Flashback {3}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{B}, Discard a card: Stalking Bloodsucker gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pits feed both its thirst for combat and its thirst for blood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile the top card of your library. You may put that card into your hand unless it has the same name as another card exiled this way. Repeat this process until you put a card into your hand or you exile two cards with the same name, whichever comes first.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player exiles all cards with flashback from their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fondest memories burn brightest. As they're lost forever, the flames grow hotter still.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature At the beginning of each upkeep, put a plague counter on Traveling Plague. Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each plague counter on Traveling Plague. When enchanted creature leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller returns Traveling Plague from its owner's graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) {B}: Whispering Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It glides through the shadows until it reaches yours.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard and Zombie Assassin: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Zombies don't kill. They recruit." - Braids, dementia summoner

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Zombie Cannibal deals combat damage to a player, you may exile target card from that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing is sacred to the undead - not even their own kind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard two cards: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The nomads' funeral pyres are more practical than ceremonial.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The first birth celebrates life. The second birth mocks it." - Mystic elder

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card at random. Acceptable Losses deals 5 damage to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Anarchist enters the battlefield, you may return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who will not follow are doomed to lead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}: Ashen Firebeast deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm not sure which impresses me most, its thoroughness or its intensity." - Matoc, lavamancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{R}, Sacrifice Barbarian Lunatic: It deals 2 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I once saw a single barbarian charge a band of twenty nomads. I've seen some crazy ones, too." - Nomad sentry

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact. Flashback {4}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature blocks, Battle Strain deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pits swallow the weak as predators swallow prey.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blazing Salvo deals 3 damage to target creature unless that creature's controller has Blazing Salvo deal 5 damage to them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Barbarians equate courage with the ability to endure pain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Put a fuse counter on target creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a fuse counter on each creature with a fuse counter on it. Whenever a creature has four or more fuse counters on it, remove all fuse counters from it and destroy it. That creature deals 4 damage to its controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller sacrifices a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pain teaches lessons no scholar can." - Kamahl, pit fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}, {T}: Chainflinger deals 1 damage to any target. Threshold - {2}{R}, {T}: Chainflinger deals 2 damage to any target. Activate only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you win a coin flip, put a luck counter on Chance Encounter. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Chance Encounter has ten or more luck counters on it, you win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The more unlikely the victory, the more memorable the success.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pound the steel until it fits. Doesn't work? Bash to bits." - Dwarven forging song

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures gain menace until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Threshold - If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, creatures can't block this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hard as stone and twice as stubborn. - Dwarven compliment

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dwarven Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for any number of Dwarf cards, reveal them, then shuffle and put those cards on top in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell, Dwarven Shrine deals X damage to that player, where X is twice the number of cards in all graveyards with the same name as that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a card at random: Dwarven Strike Force gains first strike and haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Any given foothill may hide dozens of dwarves waiting to spill from their tunnels like fire ants.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. Flashback {5}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ember Beast can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spot one ember beast, attack. Spot a second, best fall back. - Dwarven saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Engulfing Flames deals 1 damage to target creature. It can't be regenerated this turn. Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player sacrifices a land. Threshold - Each player sacrifices all lands they control instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes destruction is Dominaria's way of rebuilding. Sometimes it's not.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Firebolt deals 2 damage to any target. Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flame Burst deals X damage to any target, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Flame Burst in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As hot as a dwarf's rage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Discard a card at random: Frenetic Ogre gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best thing about ogres is that they never try to sneak up on you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His reputation precedes him - and so does his weapon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature attacks, flip a coin. If you win the flip, the next time that creature would deal combat damage this turn, it deals double that damage instead. If you lose the flip, the next time that creature would deal combat damage this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) {T}: Kamahl, Pit Fighter deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I didn't come to play. I came to win."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has first strike. Threshold - Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonbasic land unless its controller has Lava Blister deal 6 damage to them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To treat flesh wounds, use earth. To treat earth wounds, use flesh. - Barbarian saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, choose a number between 0 and 5. Liquid Fire deals X damage to target creature and 5 minus X damage to that creature's controller, where X is the chosen number.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's no such thing as a little bit of lava.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, if Mad Dog didn't attack or come under your control this turn, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bones it buries may be yours.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Sacrifice a land: Magma Vein deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Standing near a volcano - Barbarian expression meaning "asking for it"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) Magnivore's power and toughness are each equal to the number of sorcery cards in all graveyards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}, {T}: Put a mine counter on target land. Whenever a land with a mine counter on it becomes tapped, destroy it. When Mine Layer leaves the battlefield, remove all mine counters from all lands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Minotaur Explorer enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the invasion devastated the Talruum and Hurloon tribes, the survivors began to search for other minotaurs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller has Molten Influence deal 4 damage to them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lavamancers make simple requests: obey or die.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player exiles all land cards from their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a land: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His feet buckled the ground, his hands cut the wind to ribbons, and he was gone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would draw a card, you may skip that draw instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lizards make excellent familiars. They never know when they've lost." - Matoc, lavamancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste If Pardic Firecat is in a graveyard, effects from spells named Flame Burst count it as a card named Flame Burst.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've heard of putting the cat out, but this isn't what I had in mind." - Nomad sentry

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Pardic Miner: Target player can't play lands this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Punch and drag, Toss the slag, Sift the soil, Leave the spoil."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Discard a card at random: Pardic Swordsmith gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A finely crafted blade will never meet as many blows on the battlefield as it did on the anvil.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, if it's not that player's turn, destroy that land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "True strength lies in action. Let the weak react to me." - Kamahl, pit fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (Mana cost includes color.) Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard any number of cards at random. Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn for each card discarded this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Savage Firecat enters the battlefield with seven +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever you tap a land for mana, remove a +1/+1 counter from Savage Firecat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scorching Missile deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker. Flashback {9}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap target creature. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shower of Coals deals 2 damage to each of up to three targets. Threshold - Shower of Coals deals 4 damage to each of those permanents and/or players instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Spark Mage deals combat damage to a player, you may have Spark Mage deal 1 damage to target creature that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Pardic Mountains are known for their spicy cuisine.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it and Steam Vines deals 1 damage to that land's controller. That player attaches Steam Vines to a land of their choice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Thermal Blast deals 3 damage to target creature. Threshold - Thermal Blast deals 5 damage instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Otaria's frequent tremors are the last stages of Dominaria's recovery from the Phyrexian war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Volcanic Spray deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. Flashback {1}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Volley of Boulders deals 6 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Flashback {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Whipkeeper deals damage to target creature equal to the damage already dealt to it this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you don't hit your adversaries while they're down, they might get up again."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 green Bear creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature is the endless dance between life and death." - Seton, centaur druid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 4/4 green Beast creature token. Flashback {2}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token. Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Cartographer enters the battlefield, you may return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Finding the way once is luck. Finding the way twice takes a good map."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token. Flashback {1}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Chlorophant. Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Chlorophant has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put another +1/+1 counter on Chlorophant."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, Discard a card: Crashing Centaur gains trample until end of turn. Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Crashing Centaur gets +2/+2 and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Flashback {4}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Diligent Farmhand: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. If Diligent Farmhand is in a graveyard, effects from spells named Muscle Burst count it as a card named Muscle Burst.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Druid Lyrist: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The druids and the forest are in perfect harmony. They sing the same songs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, its controller creates that many 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Suffer the little creatures, for they may yet rise up and beat you senseless.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token. Flashback {6}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Gorilla Titan gets +4/+4 as long as there are no cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ground Seal enters the battlefield, draw a card. Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let all we have buried be buried forever." - Seton, centaur druid

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, Exile a card from your hand: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand if it shares a card type with the card exiled this way. (Artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal are card types.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Howling Gale deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. Flashback {1}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ivy Elemental enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the gardens of the centaurs, many travelers have mysteriously vanished while admiring the elaborate topiaries.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) {G}, Discard a card: Krosan Archer gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Threshold - {1}{G}: Regenerate Krosan Avenger. Activate only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She'd have a fearsome reputation if she left any survivors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Threshold - Krosan Beast gets +7/+7 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who see the squirrels go underground in the winter aren't ready for what emerges in the spring.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A leaf dancer sweeps through the forest like a spring breeze, evading even the sharpest eyes and ears.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Threshold - Metamorphic Wurm gets +4/+4 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only a handful have seen it transform. Or, from the wurm's perspective, only a mouthful.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Flashback {2}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is 3 plus the number of cards named Muscle Burst in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As strong as a centaur's will.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unanswered prayers are themselves answers. - Nantuko teaching

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Plant a field with wishes, and you will grow more wishes. - Nantuko teaching

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: That which grows without roots cannot be uprooted. - Nantuko teaching

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player creates X 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens, where X is the number of cards in all graveyards with the same name as that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player may search their library for up to X basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then each player who searched their library this way shuffles.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spreading a blanket of growth to warm a weary world.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Threshold - Nimble Mongoose gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token. Threshold - All Squirrels get +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dance of angry feet - Nantuko expression meaning "stampede"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle any number of target creature cards from your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who follow nature's path eventually walk in a circle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't dismiss its anger as mindless fury. I assure you, it has purpose." - Seton, centaur druid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Rabid Elephant becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Regenerate target creature. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death is a moth that dances toward our inner flame. The brightest fire can singe its wings. - Nantuko teaching

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard any number of cards. Search your library for up to that many basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.value: Create a 6/6 green Wurm creature token. Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap an untapped Druid you control: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Survival of the fittest is not only the law of the pits, it is the law of nature. That is why I fight."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, all creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A blossom's petals close inward to shut out the frost. - Nantuko teaching

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) {T}, Sacrifice Skyshooter: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control can't be the targets of blue spells or abilities from blue sources.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No mage's deception can harm those who keep nature balanced."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Threshold - Springing Tiger gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ground trembled in a violent purr.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Squirrel Mob gets +1/+1 for each other Squirrel on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An army of squirrels is still an army.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the Krosan Forest, you've got to keep an eye out for the squirrels.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}{G}: Still Life becomes a 4/3 Centaur creature in addition to its other types until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The centaurs' simple magic can undo a basilisk's gaze, but only for a short time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Stone-Tongue Basilisk deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat. Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, all creatures able to block Stone-Tongue Basilisk do so.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Flashback {2}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Terravore's power and toughness are each equal to the number of land cards in all graveyards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Twigwalker: Two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Break one in half and you'll get a decent - if gooey - pair of weapons." - Centaur warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a green nontoken creature dies, that creature's controller may search their library for a card with the same name as that creature, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target land becomes a 3/3 creature until end of turn. It's still a land. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Near the Krosan border, farmers keep watch over their fields lest the sod get up and wander away.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G}. Threshold - Werebear gets +3/+3 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He exercises his right to bear arms.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a card: Wild Mongrel gets +1/+1 and becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It teaches you to play dead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What is a tree? Slow hard thought. What is a flower? Swift soft flesh. What is a druid? Both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}, {T}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With friends like these, who needs people?"

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice an Atog creature: Atogatog gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact, target creature, target enchantment, and target land. (You can't cast this spell unless you have legal choices for all its targets.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Anyone can admire creation. Only a barbarian sees the beauty in demolition." - Kamahl, pit fighter

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She enraptures all, encompasses all, endures all.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice an artifact: Lithatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Sacrifice a land: Lithatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from black Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Mystic Enforcer gets +3/+3 and has flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice an enchantment: Phantatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Discard a card: Phantatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a card: Psychatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Exile two cards from your graveyard: Psychatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile two cards from your graveyard: Sarcatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Sacrifice an artifact: Sarcatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Whenever Shadowmage Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a land: Thaumatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Sacrifice an enchantment: Thaumatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a creature dealt damage by Vampiric Dragon this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Vampiric Dragon. {1}{R}: Vampiric Dragon deals 1 damage to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flashback costs you pay cost {2} less. Flashback costs your opponents pay cost {2} more.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The gems' incandescence invades the dreams of all who see them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Mill a card: For each colored mana symbol in the milled card's mana cost, add one mana of that color. Activate only as an instant. +lt;I+gt;(For example, if the card's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}{B}, you add {U}{U}{B}.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Darkwater Egg: Add {U}{B}. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do you thirst for knowledge no matter the cost?" - Watnik, master glassblower

property.name: Rules
property.value: Junk Golem enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Junk Golem unless you remove a +1/+1 counter from it. {1}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Junk Golem.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, Sacrifice Limestone Golem: Target player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dwarves have been known to take pickaxes to their own creations, hoping to discover treasures within.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Mill a card: Add {C}. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The toymaker frowned in bewilderment. None of his creations had ever sneezed before.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It offers you what you want, not what you need." - Braids, dementia summoner

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Mossfire Egg: Add {R}{G}. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Can you feel your instincts overwhelm your reason?" - Watnik, master glassblower

property.name: Rules
property.value: Otarian Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls. Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Otarian Juggernaut gets +3/+0 and attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a card: Regenerate Patchwork Gnomes. (The next time this creature would be destroyed, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When building gnomes, dwarves adhere to the highest standards. The gnomes themselves aren't as particular.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice two lands and Sandstone Deadfall: Destroy target attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Two or three tons of rock can really get you down - and keep you there." - Kamahl, pit fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Shadowblood Egg: Add {B}{R}. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Does your passion for power consume your soul?" - Watnik, master glassblower

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Skycloud Egg: Add {W}{U}. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have your dreams of a better society become an obsession?" - Watnik, master glassblower

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard. {1}, Sacrifice Steamclaw: Exile target card from a graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's dead, and then there's dead dead." - Steamclaw driver

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Sungrass Egg: Add {G}{W}. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Has your peaceful nature led you on a crusade?" - Watnik, master glassblower

property.name: Rules
property.value: Abandoned Outpost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}. {T}, Sacrifice Abandoned Outpost: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {R}. Barbarian Ring deals 1 damage to you. Threshold - {R}, {T}, Sacrifice Barbarian Ring: It deals 2 damage to any target. Activate only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bog Wreckage enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}. {T}, Sacrifice Bog Wreckage: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {B}. Cabal Pit deals 1 damage to you. Threshold - {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Cabal Pit: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Activate only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G}. Centaur Garden deals 1 damage to you. Threshold - {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Centaur Garden: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {U}. Cephalid Coliseum deals 1 damage to you. Threshold - {U}, {T}, Sacrifice Cephalid Coliseum: Target player draws three cards, then discards three cards. Activate only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How tragic that greed eclipses beauty." - Seton, centaur druid

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Murky Otarian tides hide the forgotten treacheries of the Phyrexian war.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A monument to long-forgotten gods, it stands as a tribute to the fleeting nature of human ways.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lush growth spreads like a ferocious blaze across the Otarian hillsides.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {W}. Nomad Stadium deals 1 damage to you. Threshold - {W}, {T}, Sacrifice Nomad Stadium: You gain 4 life. Activate only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Petrified Field: Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ravaged Highlands enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}. {T}, Sacrifice Ravaged Highlands: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Seafloor Debris enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}. {T}, Sacrifice Seafloor Debris: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The carnage of conflicts long past still stains the Otarian soil.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From Otaria, the sun above meets the sea below at a glittering horizon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Otaria, peace and harmony are rare. Places that provide both are cherished.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Tarnished Citadel deals 3 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Timberland Ruins enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {T}, Sacrifice Timberland Ruins: Add one mana of any color.
